title: New: Retro Culture – Weekend
body:
Melbourne’s **Retro Culture** is one of my favourite artists of 2013, with his unique, all-too-perfect brand of disco-pop.

New track, _Weekend_, is a dreamy, loveable affair, that if the world was a fair place, would be soundtracking a Michael Cera film about a cutesy adolescent romance. Check it out below.
